nodes.text: The Troukree knife was a knife that was made by the reptilian species of the Troukree. They had hook tips capable of easily slitting a throat. They were, according to Han Solo, made with excellent craftsmanship.

Around 1 ABY, the Hand of Judgment helped some Troukree knife merchants led by Vaantaar settle a dispute with some Pineath over a knife that the merchants sold. The Pineath attempted to cheat the traders by getting double the money back for a supposedly "faulty" knife. The Hand of Judgment saw to it that the intact knife was exchanged for the proper cost without further arguments.
